title: Real Poincar\'e series of a plane divisorial valuation
authors: Antonio Campillo, F\'elix Delgado, Sabir M. Gusein-Zade
abstract:
Earlier, there was computed the Poincar\'e series of a valuation or of a
collection of valuations on the ring of germs of holomorphic functions in two
variables. For a collection of several plane curve valuations it appeared to
coincide with the Alexander polynomial of the corresponding algebraic link.
Recently, the authors defined Poincar\'e series of a valuation or of a
collection of valuations in the real setting. (Actually, there were defined
three versions of them, however, one of them was found to be ``not
computable''.) These two Poincar'e series were computed for one plane curve
valuation. Here we compute them for a plane divisorial valuation.
